attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: I don’t even know where to start. I’m a huge Trump supporter, so naturally I downloaded this app. The first thing that happened was my phone starting to heat up. I could feel all my information being sucked in by the Chinese government who CONTROLS this app. They OWN THIS APP! Next, I got a notification from my phone settings telling me I’d been hacked. Just then I knew the source of my problems, the Chinese government, AKA the Trump 2020 app. The next day, my healthy husband died of unknown causes, I KNOW IT WAS THE TRUMP APP!!! Fly high Dave💔🕊

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: If I could give this app a 0 star rating I would. It’s layout is confusing and has a poor UI design. Although it is portrayed as #1 in news, it definitely is the opposite. It is riddled with fake news and propaganda intended to sway audiences of a lower intelligence. Not only that, but it also supports questionable figures. Horrible app. Do not download.
